title: Hell's Fire
description: On Johnny Rigg's thirteenth wedding anniversary, he and his wife Sheila visit the crater pit in Arizona. They have an accident and are rushed to hospital. Johnny comes out of a coma and starts to have premonitions. He goes on a mission to figure out the puzzle of his predictions and save his daughter from alien abduction as the world's future is held in balance. Sandra Yuen MacKay is also the author of "My Schizophrenic Life: The Road to Recovery from Mental Illness."
author: Sandra Yuen MacKay
